title: StrideCraft Shoes — Marketing Site + Catalog + Contact (Frontend)

requirements.summary: Implement responsive SPA pages and navigation: Home, Shop, Product Details, About, Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation is present on all pages and works without full page reloads.
Layout is responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Home, Shop, Product Details, About, and Contact routes/pages are accessible and render meaningful content.

file_operations.description: Create the app router and top-level layout shell (header + main + footer), wiring routes for Home, Shop, Product Details, About, and Contact using client-side navigation (no full reloads).

Create a responsive top navigation header with internal links to Home, Shop, About, Contact and include the brand logo image. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) where appropriate for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a footer that is rendered across all pages (wired in the shared layout), leaving social links as placeholders. Use shadcn-ui components as needed for consistent typography/link styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Home page content sections (hero, featured collection teaser, value props) and wire hero + logo usage from generated static assets.
Create Shop page container with product grid plus search/filter/sort controls, and wire navigation to Product Details when a product card is clicked.
Create Product Details page container that reads productId from the route and renders product info, size selection, and CTA interaction.
Create About page container and wire it to the router/layout.
Create Contact page container with the contact form UI and wire it to the router/layout.
Ensure client-side routing dependencies are present (e.g., react-router-dom) so navigation works without full page reloads; keep changes minimal and aligned with the existing build template.

requirements.summary: Define and apply a premium warm-neutral visual theme (cream/sand + charcoal/black + terracotta accent) site-wide and avoid blue/purple as primary colors.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent typography, color palette, button styles, and spacing scale.
Primary UI elements (header, sections, cards, buttons, forms) match the selected theme across the site.
No blue/purple is used as the primary brand palette (unless only present inside product photos).

file_operations.description: Add global theme tokens/styles (Tailwind base + CSS variables) to implement warm neutrals + charcoal + terracotta accent, consistent typography and spacing; ensure no blue/purple as primary palette.

Adjust/extend Tailwind theme configuration as needed to support the brand palette and consistent component styling (using existing CSS variable approach), without introducing blue/purple as primary tokens.

Apply the global theme to header states/typography and ensure responsive spacing and premium styling. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply the global theme to footer layout/typography and ensure consistent spacing with the rest of the site. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build Shop page product grid with search, category + price range filters, and price sorting.
acceptanceCriteria: Shop page shows a product grid with image, name, price, and category.
Search filters products by name (case-insensitive).
Category filter and price range filter narrow the product list.
Sorting changes product ordering appropriately.
Filtering/sorting works with data returned from the backend.

file_operations.description: Create product catalog data access helpers that use the existing backend actor (via the existing actor hook) to fetch product lists for the Shop experience, returning backend-provided product data for client-side search/filter/sort.
Create a React Query hook to load the product list for the Shop page with caching and refetch behavior aligned with the app actor lifecycle.

Create a responsive product grid component that renders product cards with image, name, price, and category; supports empty state rendering and click-through to Product Details. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create search input, category select, price range controls, and sort controls; emit normalized filter state to the parent. Use shadcn-ui Input/Select (and other relevant components) as appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire React Query product loading into the Shop page; implement case-insensitive search + category/price filtering and price sorting against backend-returned data; render loading and empty states; ensure product card navigation to Product Details uses client-side routing.

requirements.summary: Build Product Details page with images, details, size selection, and a clear CTA with non-persistent UI feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a product from the Shop page navigates to its Product Details page.
Product Details shows at least one image, name, price, description, and a selectable size list.
CTA button is present and visibly styled; if cart is not implemented, the CTA triggers a non-persistent UI action (e.g., opens an inquiry modal or shows a confirmation toast).

file_operations.description: Create a React Query hook to fetch a single product by ID from the backend actor and surface loading/error/not-found states.
Create a size selection UI for available sizes with clear selected state. Use shadcn-ui Button/Toggle-like components if available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a simple product image gallery/hero image renderer that uses product image paths (static assets) with graceful fallback behavior. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire route param -> React Query product fetch; render loading state, a clear not-found state for invalid IDs, and the product details UI with size selection and a styled CTA that triggers a non-persistent confirmation (e.g., toast/dialog). Use shadcn-ui components as appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure product cards/rows link to the Product Details route using client-side navigation (no full reloads).

requirements.summary: Create Contact page form (name, email, message) that submits via React Query mutation and shows success/error UI states.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields before submit.
On successful submission, the user sees a clear success confirmation and the form resets.
On failure, the user sees a clear error message.
Backend stores contact submissions (timestamped) in stable state.

file_operations.description: Create a contact submission helper that uses the backend actor to submit the form fields and returns the backend-provided submission identifier.
Create a React Query mutation hook for contact submission with success/error handling hooks for UI feedback.

Create the Contact form UI with required-field validation, disabled/loading submit state, and inline success/error messages. Use shadcn-ui Form/Input/Textarea/Button components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the ContactForm into the page and ensure the page layout matches the global theme and responsive constraints.

requirements.summary: Create an About page with at least three brand story sections plus a simple timeline or values list.
acceptanceCriteria: About page contains at least 3 distinct content sections and reads as a coherent shoe brand story.
Content layout is responsive and matches the site’s theme.

file_operations.description: Add branded content sections (e.g., Craft, Materials, Sustainability) plus a timeline/values list, ensuring responsive layout and consistent premium theme styling.
Create a simple responsive values list/timeline component and use it from the About page to ensure the content structure is clear and consistent with the theme.

requirements.summary: Use React Query for product catalog fetching/caching and contact submission; implement loading/empty/not-found states.
acceptanceCriteria: Shop page shows a loading state while products load and an empty state when no products match filters.
Product Details page shows a loading state and a clear not-found state for invalid IDs.
Data fetching uses React Query (queries/mutations) rather than ad-hoc fetch state.

file_operations.description: Ensure Shop page uses React Query hooks for product loading and renders explicit loading + empty states based on query status and filter results.
Ensure Product Details uses React Query hook and renders explicit loading + not-found states.
Ensure Contact submission uses React Query mutation (no ad-hoc fetch state) and renders explicit submitting/success/error UI states.

requirements.summary: Add a theme-matching footer with key links, company info, and social placeholders across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages and matches the theme.
Footer includes at least 3 internal links and basic company text.
Social links are present as placeholders (e.g., icons/labels) and do not require external API calls.

file_operations.description: Implement footer content: internal links (Shop/About/Contact), basic company info text, and social placeholders; ensure theme alignment and responsive layout. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the SiteFooter into the shared layout so it appears on all routes/pages.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI (logo, hero, product images).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the frontend via static paths.
Home page uses the hero image and logo.
Shop/Product Details use the product images from the generated assets.

Add the generated hero banner asset at this exact path for static usage in the UI.
Add the generated background texture asset at this exact path for static usage in the UI.
Add the generated product image asset at this exact path for static usage in the UI.

Reference these static assets in the Home UI: frontend/public/assets/generated/stridecraft-logo.dim_512x512.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png; optionally use frontend/public/assets/generated/paper-texture.dim_1600x1600.png as a subtle background texture consistent with the theme.

Ensure product cards render product images that correspond to generated assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-01.dim_1024x1024.png through frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-06.dim_1024x1024.png), using the product's image path when provided and a sensible fallback when missing.

Ensure Product Details renders product images using static generated assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-01.dim_1024x1024.png through frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-06.dim_1024x1024.png) as provided by product data and/or as fallback.
